description: This file defines a toolkit for interacting with Google Sheets, including setting up tools and an agent to facilitate user interactions with spreadsheets via the Google Sheets API.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can perform tasks using specified tools and instructions.

classes.name: GoogleSheetsTools
classes.description: A class providing methods to interact with Google Sheets, such as reading, creating, updating, and duplicating sheets.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to output a response message, likely for user interaction.
